mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, INQUIRY_ID, USERID, EMPLOYEE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, ANSWER_STATUS, EDIT_DATE, ANSWER_DATE, ANSWER_CONTENT, ATTACHEMENT_FILENAME, INQUIRY_TYPE, EMP_NAME from (select * from INQUIRY order by EDIT_DATE desc)) where rnum >= #{ startRow } and rnum <= #{ endRow }
select count(*) from INQUIRY where INQUIRY_TYPE = #{type}
select count(*) from inquiry where USERID = #{ keyword }
select count(*) from inquiry where INQUIRY_TITLE like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select count(*) from inquiry where INQUIRY_TYPE = #{ keyword }
select count(*) from inquiry where EDIT_DATE between #{begin} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, INQUIRY_ID, USERID, EMPLOYEE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, ANSWER_STATUS, EDIT_DATE, ANSWER_DATE, ANSWER_CONTENT, ATTACHEMENT_FILENAME, INQUIRY_TYPE, EMP_NAME from (select * from INQUIRY where INQUIRY_TITLE like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by EDIT_DATE DESC)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
select * from INQUIRY where userid = #{ userId }

insert.if: insert into inquiry (INQUIRY_ID, USERID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, ANSWER_STATUS, EDIT_DATE,ATTACHEMENT_FILENAME, INQUIRY_TYPE) VALUES (default, #{userId}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{answerStatus}, sysdate,#{attachmentFileName}, #{inquiryType})

insert into inquiry (INQUIRY_ID, USERID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, ANSWER_STATUS, EDIT_DATE,ATTACHEMENT_FILENAME, INQUIRY_TYPE) VALUES (default, #{userId}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{answerStatus}, sysdate,#{attachmentFileName}, 3)

mapper.update: update inquiry set ANSWER_STATUS = 'Y', ANSWER_DATE = SYSDATE, ANSWER_CONTENT = #{ answerContent }, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId }, EMP_NAME = #{ employeeName } where INQUIRY_ID = #{ inquiryId }
mapper.select: select * from INQUIRY where INQUIRY_ID = #{ inquiryId }
